channel.title: My Website
channel.description: My website is Project Rainbow (http://projectrainbow.net being the homepage and http://projectrainbow.net/smf for the forums), we're mostly a 317 private server but we've also added a programming section, and a section for RSPS development (although nobody actually visits that). Aside from those categories, we mostly have general discussion about stuff. I'm wondering if it can be approved or not on Moparscape, because my website covers multiple grounds.

item.title: My Website
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

No other mods have disagreed, so we’ll go ahead and consider it approved.

Read full topic

item.title: My Website
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Alright well, I guess I can approve it. We’ll wait to see if any other mods agree/disagree.

Read full topic

item.title: My Website
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

The website is not aimed at RSPS discussion, but rather at my private server. The RSPS discussion section is almost nonexistant, less than 25 topics in that section in total.

Read full topic

item.title: My Website
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Does it need a lot of general discussion for RSPS? We typically don’t like the idea of allowing people to advertise websites that are similar to MoparScape.

Read full topic
